channel.title: How can I add titlebutton sprites?
channel.description:
Well, I figured out how to add titlebox sprites, but I can't seem to get the buttons working for like the back button or log in, so far, I got this:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/6344/pic1ss3.png[/img][/URL]
I have added the sprite in class2...1...1, and I just can't figure out how to load that sprite, I got the titlebox to load, but I can't seem to get this sprite to load. I just can't get the part right in client.java, any help please?
(Fixing login screen and background lol, gonna download cs3 when I get home tomorrow night.)
Once I get those down, I plan to make the log in buttons smaller and then make the extra space transparent, so it can match the log in button.
